gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: World Meteorological Organization WMO and Federal Office for Meteorology and Climatology MeteoSwiss

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Section of Meteorology of Environment Division of Climatology HNMS 14 El. Venizeloy Str. Hellinikon
Aristotle University of Thessaloniki Laboratory of Atmospheric Phsyics Box 149
Laboratory of Atmospheric Physics, School of Physics

wmdr:Description.wmdr:description: The Brewer spectrophotometers and all radaition instruments are located on the roof of the 4-storey building of the Physics Dept., of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. The Campus is located in the city center about 500 m east of the seashore. The highest elevation of about 1100 m is at a distance of about 15 km towards the east. Thessaloniki is the second largest city of Greece with about 1000000 inhabitants in the greater metropolitan area.
